nodes.text: Amazing how NC is an open carry state and he got the law called on him to begin with but yeah go off with ya yt view of complying being the answer. The real issue is WHY were the cops called to begin with. https://t.co/cpQif1i77w
@ksopendoorstwo Because the neighbor is a moron.
Fuck police. Every single one of em. That goes for black ones, white ones, Asian ones, small ones, tall ones, chubby ones, skinny ones, ones with brown eyes, ones with blue eyes. All of em. Fuck em!
And that list isn’t all inclusive in the one’s that were listed. Its literally fuck all cops!

If that were a white person, the law wouldn’t have been called on him.  And even if it were about complying, not complying isn’t a death warrant. The reason why cops kill people is b/c they swear they are the end all. If someone doesn’t OBEY, they feel their manhood is taken

Yt people love to be willfully ignorant on an issue when it comes to policing.  The issue isn’t about complying.  The issue to begin with, is why was a black person subjected to potential police violence for carrying a gun in an open carry state?
